data.content:
Danh từ
sự tập trung
power of concentration
năng lực tập trung tư tưởng
nhóm tập trung, khu tập trung
concentrations of industrial buildings
khu tập trung các nhà xưởng công nghiệp

noun
[noncount] :the ability to give your attention or thought to a single object or activity :the ability to concentrate
the power of concentration
All that noise is disturbing my concentration.
The job required her full concentration.
When you're tired it's easy to lose your concentration.
the act of giving your attention to a single object or activity [singular]
There was a concentration on ethics within the agency.
His concentration [=focus] was on gathering evidence for the trial. [noncount]
a student who chose law as his field/area of concentration [=his main area of study]
a large amount of something in one place [count]
There is a concentration of wealth in the cities. [noncount]
He objects to the concentration of power in the hands of a few rich men.
[count] :a large number of people in one place
Officials are expecting a heavy/high concentration of tourists [=are expecting many tourists] for the festival.
[count] :the amount of an ingredient in a mixture
Contaminants were found in low concentrations. [=amounts]
measuring the concentration of salt in a solution
They detected high concentrations of pollutants in the water.
